title: Network Warning
body: So I made a post about this and did everything the Dev told me to, but it still didn't work, and every time I'm in the loading screen the 'Network Warning' still pops up and no my internet is fine, and Yes i have the HRT and no it doesn't do anything. I just bought these SG skins but it sucks that I can't see the borders cause i cant even load into a game.

replies.body: If the steps Broporo didn't help, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can work with you directly.  The HRT should have also provided some logs which you can attach to your ticket for more context.  We'll see you there!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=oTIGjsWq,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-07T20:56:36.253+0000)
>
> If the steps Broporo didn't help, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can work with you directly.  The HRT should have also provided some logs which you can attach to your ticket for more context.  We'll see you there!

I did send a ticket. I'm in the waiting process
